Nate Winn

Colophon

My name is Nate Winn and I live in the heart of the Silicon Valley with my wife Jo and my little boy, Owen. Currently, I'm attending fulfilling a dream and attending the RubyOnRails cohort at The Iron Yard in Atlanta.

You'll find me writing about a myriad of topics on this site, but predominately coding, technology, and design will be the topics. I've been writing here since 2014.

You can also find me on Twitter, here or on GitHub, here.

My Setup

This blog is hosted on GitHub Pages, run by Jekyll, built on the Lanyon theme, and written in Markdown.

I'm a big fan of apple products. I write and code on a 2011 13-inch MacBook Air and talk and text on an iPhone 5.

Mac Tools

My toolbox is pretty basic though I am constantly trying out new software to see if it improves my workflow. You can take a closer look at the software I use on a daily basis below.

  • 1Password to remember
  • Airmail to email
  • Aodobe CC to design
  • Dropbox to store and share
  • Google Chrome to browse
  • nvAlt to jot notes
  • OmniFocus to plan
  • Sublime Text 2 to code
  • TextExpander to save time
  • Tweetbot to tweet
  • YNAB to budget

Other Tools

I also couldn't do without The Roost Stand to perch my laptop up, Parrot Zik Headphones to block out distractions, Apple Wireless Keyboard, and Apple Magic Mouse. I'm always scribbling jotting down thoughts. Currently, these are captured in a Barron Fig Confidant. I tote all this stuff around in a Minaal backpack.

Feel free to reach out to me anytime by email at hi[@]natewinn.com or on twitter at @natewinn.

Thanks for reading!
